data.message:
Yo Em you give me the inspiration to pick up a pen and write relating to your music is what has been getting me through the toughest times of life 🙏 thanks ! 

I'm tired of running from my CONVICTION, Tired of hiding my drug ADDICTION, tired of being in the same POSITION....broke as fuck like a family TRADITION, 

I'm tired of being my worst ENEMY, Beating myself up for EVERYTHING, Should of known she never cared for ME, she's Hated ME, since PREGNANCY, 

Instead of getting better I just see it getting WORST, do anything to have this shit REVERSED, but this is real life can't be REHEARSED, learn from your mistakes and put god FIRST, hurts every-time I spit this VERSE, 

Sick of UNDERACHIEVING tired of not SUCCEEDING, girls always thinking your CHEATING, my shitty ass car always OVERHEATING, tired of sticking around and not LEAVING, for someone that doesn't give a fuck about my FEELINGS,

Tired of making minimum WAGE, and not having my own PLACE, not having any likes on my Instagram PAGE, tired of being called a DISGRACE,

i'm tired of my financial MESS, and living  check to CHECK, people asking why I always look UPSET, tired of being someone else's biggest REGRET, and not having the balls to get OVER IT,

I'm tired of living the same as YESTERDAY, for letting my happiness get AWAY,  I'm tired of being alone on HOLIDAYS, and not having no one to CELEBRATE, living a life you wish you could just throw AWAY..

tired of having the same old clothes in my DRAWER, having the same fucked up credit SCORE, having a big heart just to have it TORE more and MORE.
